name: RetroRift Legends
description:
Welcome to 2050, fellow scientist! 

You are in charge of creating the virtuality portal, which can bring together the digital and real world in many ways. Will this be a good feature... or the actual extinction of our race?

Control your character with the W, A, S and D keys or the arrow keys.

Press the Spacebar to shoot.

You must hit the enemies, commonly seen as the "bad guys" in retro games, and carefully dodge the obstacles, known as the "good guys"!
